position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 1344, 'name': 'Honeywell', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFvcIh3UnA5zw/company-logo_400_400/0/1535662846602?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=kUmtVZzmZe9xL4hOGij19KZU_i9CQ6W7SWInhVjNT7Y', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Honeywell', 'description': 'Efforts for HPS Project Sourcing to expand the global supplier base to keep pace with growing business and customer requirements, eliminate single source situations, setup category, key supplier and project based Sourcing Strategies, drive standardization in processes and drive a more competitive environment. Works closely with cross-functional teams, has responsibility for identifying, developing and qualifying new suppliers, negotiating, implementing commercial supplier agreements, support internal process compliance and meeting performance targets for the organization. In addition, coordinates and delivers support to regional/local procurement teams on proposal and execution phase of the projects. Has global responsibility for vendor management, budgetary pricing, cost benchmarking and sourcing strategy. Currently, directing the activities of a global team of Category Managers and Pole Level Category Responsible to assist business in identifying the 3rd Party sourcing strategies required to achieve a competitive cost structure based on both market trends and cost drivers by creating meaningful connections between sourcing analytics and market & sales strategies. Key categories focused include Fabrication & Static Equipment, Valves, Analyzers & Rotating Equipment, RIEs, Shelters & Accessories, System Solutions & Instruments, Marshalling Systems, Barriers & Special Equipment, and Software Solutions where the annual spend in > $300M.

Achievements include, supplier account management and supplier development, leading cross-functional team, deployment and validation of Price Books, Budgetary Pricing and Benchmarking Tools, negotiation global contracts, leading standardization programs, contribution in M&A team, integration of new businesses. 

This role contained aspects of value sourcing, outsourcing and highly technical environment working closely with Sourcing, Proposal & Estimation, Marketing, Sales, Lead Engineers and Business Leaders.', 'title': 'Global Category Management Team Leader', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Rotterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Honeywell', 'description': "Breakthrough Initiatives (BTI's) are utilized to overdrive current strategic plans. These initiatives are either areas that are mainstream but not well-addressed in our current business models or forward-looking opportunities that are leading Market demand (but where demand is anticipated to develop quickly when they become more mainstream). BTI Midstream Business consists of projects of Pipelines, Terminals, City Gas and the Measurement and Pressure Skids that connect these markets to other verticals including Power Gen, Chemicals and Refineries. The main target is to grow our Sales from $102M (2015) to $275M (2021) by 169% by maintaining our profit margin, where Sourcing is the critical contributor since ≥ 60% of the cost is based on 3rd party.

The role Global Strategic Sourcing Leader for BTI Midstream has been added on top of my current role of Global Category Management Team Leader for Engineered Solutions. With this new role a new organization structure is set-up where 3 BTI Midstream Pole Leaders (APAC, EMEA and AMERICA) 2 Sourcing Leaders (Elster-KL and Elster-UK) are added in my team besides the existing Global Category Managers. In order to help our Business to meet/exceed the challenging growth targets, my team drives the Sourcing Strategies and critical supplier relations to ensure accurate and competitive 3rd party prices right from beginning, so that we can increase our win rate. So far, we have shown Sourcing’s critical contribution is the key factor for success since we have scored multiple Mega projects where we could bid more competitive against our competitors. I have also taken active role during the integration process of Elster Sourcing Teams into Honeywell HPS during 2016, by coordinating all Elster project business sites and actively supporting them on 3rd party items in their projects.", 'title': 'Global Strategic Sourcing Leader BTI Midstream & Global Category Management Team Leader', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Honeywell', 'description': 'Global Project Sourcing CoE Leader I Global Strategic Sourcing Leader for Honeywell Process Solutions
Responsible for international and multinational team of Global Category Managers managing 3rd party categories for Engineered Equipment. Responsible of developing and maintatining supplier base, Auditing and Qualifying Suppliers on global base, Price Books, Budgetary Pricing Tools, Benchmarking Tools, Long Term Agreements, Supplier Score Cards, Strategic Relationship Management. Supporting local Sourcing Teams globally to setup Sourcing Strategy, supplier selection based on project requirements and geographical aspects and empowering negotiation positions.
